resources.string: If you want efficiently load your link, please install LoaderDroid.
Loader Droid is high quality download manager for Android

HIGHLIGHTS:
 - Resumable downloads (continue loading from the same place it was interrupted)
 - Auto pause when connection lost
 - Auto resume when connection reappear
 - Intercepts links from Browser and other applications
 - You can define what connection is allowed for each link (WI-FI, 3G, etc)
 - Stable, fast and easy to use
Please go to Google Play, and install LoaderDroid there. Once it is installed, return back here and your loading will be added
Unfortunately, you don\'t have Google Play installed on your device
